Articles.Content:
I am totally speechless, visit real planets... in minecraft. You can view the map like KSP and see everything orbiting and you can go to other planets and moons.

http://micdoodle8.com/mods/galacticraft

Bam!
Yep, its pretty awesome !!! You even need oxygen to survive the vacum
Heeeey that looks neat! KSP replaced my Minecraft (tekkit) addiction, but now it might come back... Should get some KSP folk on a server and have some fun!

Heeeey that looks neat! KSP replaced my Minecraft (tekkit) addiction, but now it might come back... Should get some KSP folk on a server and have some fun!

Galacticraft is actually included in the most recent version of Tekkit :-).

Galacticraft doesn't have any orbits though i believe. You have rockets, but once you get to the higher parts of the atmosphere it takes you to a menu, and the next thing you see is you parachuting down onto the planet you want to go to (assuming you brought one, which i do advise ). It's still a very neat mod though, i love the way you need oxygen :-).

FINALY SOMEONE IS SPREDDING THE WORD ABOUT THAT AMAZING MOD! but.. why here  this is a ksp fourm and a minecraft mod mod made it. well atleast its not a mod like..like... the SLENDYTUBBIES MOD

Edited July 11, 2018 by bQuest

Indeed, one of the must have mods. It almost has zero interference with people who still want to play stock on the server as it doesn't change the rules and they only see few extra ores.

But if they want, they can work hard and reach all kinds of new worlds.

Or just make a space station and fill it with chickens flapping in mid air.

On 7/10/2018 at 10:27 PM, bQuest said:

FINALY

Finally?     Hmmmm... If I only played Minecraft, that might be cool.

played all day yesterday, still dont have the materials to build a rocket. try again later today. thats what i get for not enabling cheats.

Edited July 14, 2018 by Nuke

3 hours ago, Nuke said:

played all day yesterday, still dont have the materials to build a rocket. try again later today. thats what i get for not enabling cheats.

There's an old trick for that. Just open a LAN server :V

I know this is old, but there's a better mod called Advanced Rocketry.

On 7/12/2018 at 7:18 AM, lajoswinkler said:

Indeed, one of the must have mods. It almost has zero interference with people who still want to play stock on the server as it doesn't change the rules and they only see few extra ores.

But if they want, they can work hard and reach all kinds of new worlds.

Or just make a space station and fill it with chickens flapping in mid air.

There's a better mod than galacticraft now. https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/advanced-rocketry
If it wasn't already taken, "Starcraft" would have been the perfect name for this mod
Starcraft is about zergs. And Sarah Kerrigan/

On 5/27/2021 at 2:51 AM, kerbiloid said:

Starcraft is about zergs. And Sarah Kerrigan/

i thought it was a pylon building simulator.

Galacticraft is... Alright. It was really nice for the time but Advanced Rocketry overtakes it IMO. The ability to construct your own rockets and space stations is quite nice as well as other differences. I remember Galacticraft being horrendously grindy at least with the expansions.

And "starcraft" would imply you're going to other stars, which for the most part is not the case.
